summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Frizz Rescue Curl Retainer is a jelly styler that provides exceptional frizz reduction and defines curls with medium hold-no stickiness or stiffness.
details: DetailsBenefitsA non-sticky jelly that retains curls and definition and will give soft, smooth and bouncy curls that last.Controls frizz up to 72hrs in extreme humidity*Reduces frizz by up to 79% for up to 72hrs*87% agreed their curls felt soft and bouncy**Made with a tri-oil blend that forms an invisible layer helping curls stay defined*Based on third party testing**Based on an independent study on people with wavy, curly, coily hairFeaturesBEST FOR: Frizzy hairFORMAT: JellyHOLD LEVEL: 6-Medium holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643544How To UseApply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Corn Starch Modified, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, PVP, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Seed Butter, Niacinamide, Squalane, Glycerin, C9-12 Alkane, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Tocopherol, Laureth-2, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, S odium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-Terpinene, Dimethyl Phenethyl Acetate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium (Orange) Peel Oil, Pinene, Rose Ketones, Vanillin.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
